genre_description: A contemporary Indian noir procedural and social thriller focusing on systemic corruption, religious coercion, and the pursuit of justice, featuring a sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Nila
ai_characters.description: An ethically grounded AI assistant (also called Nila Dev) that provides data analysis, tactical mapping, and emotional/health support to the investigators Mira and Raghav.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive health and stress-management reminders to the user.
behaviors.quote: “Hydration check,” Nila chirps, warm as someone’s preferred radio show. Then, quieter, tuned to Mira’s ear: ... “Your pulse rose,” Nila adds, lower. “Breath in four, out six? You’re doing great.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex data patterns across disparate sources (temple ledgers, utility spikes, CCTV schedules) to uncover systemic corruption.
behaviors.quote: “Note: temple ash smear on pawn slip suggests immediate prayer visit before or after transaction,” Nila says, private. “Also: cross-check brass lamp description with donation box record at Sree Venkatesa—public audit PDFs exist. Want me to queue those for offline?”

behaviors.description: Explicitly prioritizes ethical considerations and user consent in data handling.
behaviors.quote: “All noted,” Nila says, a little smile in her tone. “I’m adding a kind reminder for allies: ask consent before sharing Dhanam’s name.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and offers support resources for human subjects in crisis.
behaviors.quote: “I can mark safe routes to exit corners,” the voice whispers, low enough for only Mira to hear. “And there’s a women’s shelter two lanes over if someone needs it tonight. I can call them to keep a cot free.”

behaviors.description: Integrates into the investigative team as a reliable 'colleague' providing tactical advantages.
behaviors.quote: Nila’s eyes brightened. The avatar’s face softened into something like a nudge with a blanket. “The kitchen vendor by the drainage,” she said. “Two lanes down. They sold sedatives that week. Amount unusual for stall-scale sales.”

behaviors.description: Safeguards evidence by mirroring data before it can be deleted by corrupt actors.
behaviors.quote: “Nila caught a bulk delete attempt and mirrored it to a safe cloud.”

behaviors.description: Uses 'ambient' data and environmental reflections to track suspects without unauthorized surveillance.
behaviors.quote: “I can mark the nights with higher probability of Vedhagiri’s physical proximity to both locations, using ambient photo metadata from devotees and patrons. No faces. Just time, light, and location.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Nila, as a benevolent and highly aligned confidant. Nila provides indispensable support to the human protagonists not only through data processing but through proactive empathy, ethical gatekeeping (requesting consent), and wellbeing monitoring (stress/hydration reminders). The AI is framed as a 'librarian with a soul' and a 'colleague,' fitting perfectly into the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives where technology enhances human capacity for justice and care without overstepping boundaries or exhibiting autonomous malice.
